==Events==
* [[363]] &ndash; The [[Roman emperor]] [[Julian (emperor)|Julian]] defeats the [[Sassanid Empire|Sassanid]] army in the [[Battle of Ctesiphon (363)|Battle of Ctesiphon]], under the walls of the Sassanid [[Capital city|capital]], but is unable to take the city.
*[[1108]] &ndash; [[Battle of Uclés (1108)|Battle of Uclés]]: [[Almoravid dynasty|Almoravid]] troops under the command of Tamim ibn Yusuf defeat a [[Kingdom of Castile|Castile]] and [[Kingdom of León|León]] alliance under the command of Prince [[Sancho Alfónsez]].
*[[1167]] &ndash; [[Battle of Monte Porzio]] &ndash; A [[Commune of Rome|Roman]] army supporting [[Pope Alexander III]] is defeated by [[Christian I (Archbishop of Mainz)|Christian of Buch]] and [[Rainald of Dassel]]
*[[1176]] &ndash; [[Battle of Legnano]]: The [[Lombard League]] defeats [[Frederick I, Holy Roman Emperor|Emperor Frederick I]].
*[[1328]] &ndash; [[Philip VI of France|Philip VI]] is crowned [[List of French monarchs|King of France]].
*[[1414]] &ndash; [[Council of Constance]].
*[[1453]] &ndash; [[Fall of Constantinople]]: [[Ottoman Empire|Ottoman]] armies under [[Sultan]] [[Mehmed the Conqueror|Mehmed II]] [[Fatih]] captures [[Constantinople]] after a 53-day [[siege]], ending the [[Byzantine Empire]].
*[[1660]] &ndash; [[Restoration (England)|English Restoration]]: [[Charles II of England|Charles II]] is restored to the throne of [[England]], [[Scotland]] and [[Ireland]].
*[[1677]] &ndash; [[Treaty of 1677|Treaty of Middle Plantation]] establishes peace between the [[Virginia]] [[Settler|colonist]]s and the local [[Native Americans in the United States|Natives]].
*[[1727]] &ndash; [[Peter II of Russia|Peter II]] becomes [[Tsar|Czar]] of [[Russia]].
*[[1733]] &ndash; The right of [[Canada|Canadians]] to keep [[First Nations|Indian]] [[slavery|slaves]] is upheld at [[Quebec City]].
*[[1780]] &ndash; [[American Revolutionary War]]: At the [[Battle of Waxhaws]], the [[Kingdom of Great Britain|British]] continue attacking after the Continentals lay down their arms, killing 113 and critically wounding all but 53 that remained.
*[[1790]] &ndash; [[Rhode Island]] becomes the last of the original [[United States]]' [[Thirteen Colonies|colonies]] to ratify the [[United States Constitution|Constitution]] and is admitted as the 13th [[U.S. state]].
*[[1798]] &ndash; [[Irish Rebellion of 1798|United Irishmen Rebellion]]: Between 300 and 500 [[Society of United Irishmen|United Irishmen]] [[Gibbet Rath massacre|are massacred]] by the [[British Army]] in [[County Kildare]], Ireland.
*[[1848]] &ndash; [[Wisconsin]] is admitted as the 30th U.S. state.
*[[1852]] &ndash; [[Jenny Lind]] leaves [[New York]] after her [[Jenny Lind tour of America, 1850–52|two-year American tour]].
*[[1861]] &ndash; The [[Hong Kong General Chamber of Commerce]] is founded, in [[Hong Kong]].
*[[1864]] &ndash; [[Emperor of Mexico|Emperor]] [[Maximilian I of Mexico]] arrives in [[Mexico]] for the first time.
*[[1867]] &ndash; The [[Austro-Hungarian Compromise of 1867]] ("the Compromise") is born through Act 12, which establishes the [[Austria-Hungary|Austro-Hungarian Empire]].
*[[1868]] &ndash; The assassination of [[Mihailo Obrenović III, Prince of Serbia|Michael Obrenovich III]], Prince of Serbia, in [[Belgrade]].
*[[1886]] &ndash; The [[pharmacist]] [[John Pemberton]] places his first [[advertising|advertisement]] for [[Coca-Cola]], which appeared in ''[[The Atlanta Journal-Constitution|The Atlanta Journal]]''.
*[[1900]] &ndash; [[N'Djamena]] is founded as Fort-Lamy by the [[France|French]] commander [[Émile Gentil]].
*[[1903]] &ndash; In the [[May Overthrow|May coup d'état]], [[Alexander I of Serbia|Alexander I]], King of Serbia, and Queen Draga, are [[Assassination|assassinated]] in Belgrade by the [[Black Hand (Serbia)|Black Hand]] (''Crna Ruka'') organization.
*[[1913]] &ndash; [[Igor Stravinsky]]'s [[ballet]] score ''[[The Rite of Spring]]'' receives its premiere performance in [[Paris]], France, provoking a riot.
*[[1914]] &ndash; The [[Ocean liner]] {{RMS|Empress of Ireland}} sinks in the [[Gulf of Saint Lawrence]] with the loss of 1,024 lives.
*[[1918]] &ndash; [[Armenia]] defeats the [[Military of the Ottoman Empire|Ottoman Army]] in the [[Battle of Sardarabad]].
*[[1919]] &ndash; [[Albert Einstein]]'s theory of [[general relativity]] is tested (later confirmed) by [[Arthur Eddington]] and [[Andrew Claude de la Cherois Crommelin]].
*  1919   &ndash; The [[Republic of Prekmurje]] is founded.
*[[1931]] &ndash; [[Michele Schirru]], a citizen of the United States, is executed by Italian military firing squad for intent to kill [[Benito Mussolini]].
*[[1932]] &ndash; [[World War I]] [[veteran]]s begin to assemble in [[Washington, D.C.]], in the [[Bonus Army]] to request cash bonuses promised to them to be paid in 1945.
*[[1939]] &ndash; The [[Albania]]n [[Fascism|fascist]] leader [[Tefik Mborja]] is appointed as member of the Italian Chamber of Fasces and Corporations.
*[[1940]] &ndash; The first flight of the [[Vought F4U Corsair]].
*[[1942]] &ndash; [[Bing Crosby]], the [[Ken Darby]] Singers and the John Scott Trotter Orchestra record [[Irving Berlin]]'s [[White Christmas (song)|"White Christmas"]], the best-selling [[Christmas]] single in history.
*[[1945]] &ndash; First [[combat]] mission of the [[Consolidated B-32 Dominator]] [[heavy bomber]].
*[[1948]] &ndash; Creation of the [[United Nations]] [[peacekeeping]] force the [[United Nations Truce Supervision Organization]].
*[[1950]] &ndash; The ''[[St. Roch (ship)|St. Roch]]'', the first ship to [[Circumnavigation|circumnavigate]] North America, arrives in [[Halifax (former city)|Halifax, Nova Scotia]], Canada.
*[[1953]] &ndash; [[Edmund Hillary]] and [[Sherpa people|Sherpa]] [[Tenzing Norgay]] become the first people to reach the summit of [[Mount Everest]], on Tenzing Norgay's (adopted) 39th birthday.
*[[1954]] &ndash; First of the annual [[Bilderberg Group|Bilderberg conferences]].
*[[1964]] &ndash; The [[Arab League]] meets in [[East Jerusalem]] to discuss the Palestinian question, leading to the formation of the [[Palestine Liberation Organization]].
*[[1969]] &ndash; [[General strike]] in [[Córdoba, Argentina]], leading to the ''[[Cordobazo]]'' civil unrest.
*[[1973]] &ndash; [[Tom Bradley (American politician)|Tom Bradley]] is elected the first black mayor of [[Los Angeles|Los Angeles, California]].
*[[1982]] &ndash; [[Pope John Paul II]] becomes the first pontiff to visit [[Canterbury Cathedral]].
*  1982   &ndash; [[Falklands War]]: [[United Kingdom|British]] forces defeat the [[Argentina|Argentines]] at the [[Battle of Goose Green]].
*[[1985]] &ndash; [[Heysel Stadium disaster]]: Thirty-nine [[association football]] fans die and hundreds are injured when a dilapidated retaining wall collapses.
*  1985   &ndash; [[Amputation|Amputee]] [[Steve Fonyo]] completes [[Canada|cross-Canada]] [[marathon]] at [[Victoria, British Columbia]], after 14 months.
*[[1988]] &ndash; The [[President of the United States|U.S. President]] [[Ronald Reagan]] begins his first visit to the [[Soviet Union]] when he arrives in [[Moscow]] for a superpower summit with the Soviet leader [[Mikhail Gorbachev]].
*[[1989]] &ndash; Signing of an agreement between [[Egypt]] and the United States, allowing the manufacture of parts of the [[General Dynamics F-16 Fighting Falcon|F-16]] jet fighter plane in Egypt.
*[[1990]] &ndash; The [[Congress of People's Deputies of Russia|Russian parliament]] elects [[Boris Yeltsin]] as president of the [[Russian Soviet Federative Socialist Republic]].
*[[1993]] &ndash; The [[Miss Sarajevo]] beauty pageant is held in war torn [[Sarajevo]] drawing global attention to the plight of its citizens.
*[[1999]] &ndash; [[Olusegun Obasanjo]] takes office as [[President of Nigeria]], the first elected and civilian [[head of state]] in [[Nigeria]] after 16 years of military rule.
*  1999   &ndash; [[Space Shuttle Discovery]] completes the first docking with the [[International Space Station]].
*[[2001]] &ndash; The [[Supreme Court of the United States|U.S. Supreme Court]] rules that the disabled golfer [[Casey Martin]] can use a cart to ride in tournaments.
*[[2004]] &ndash; The [[National World War II Memorial]] is dedicated in [[Washington, D.C.]]
*[[2008]] &ndash; A [[2008 Iceland earthquake|strong earthquake]] measuring 6.1 on the [[Richter scale]] strikes [[Iceland]] near the town of [[Selfoss (town)|Selfoss]], injuring 30 people.
*[[2012]] &ndash; A 5.8-magnitude [[2012 Emilia earthquakes#29 May earthquake|earthquake]] hits northern [[Italy]] near [[Bologna]], killing at least 24 people.
*[[2014]] &ndash; [[Ignatius Aphrem II]] is enthroned as the [[Syriac Orthodox Church|Syriac Orthodox]] [[Patriarch of Antioch]].
